metadata.name: Utopian Grid
metadata.description: It is the Utopian Renaissance's first chapter in this narrative. Utopian GRiD is a vibrant digital generation friendly canvas space for immersive digital experiences. The 1/50 mint is a key for arts-focused owners and experience seekers. It's a glowing immersive space with neon lights and supersized canvas exhibition spaces, which has a large auditorium to host events. This is the metamorphosis of the traditional gallery into an exciting contemporary art gallery for NFT creators, founders,NFT owners, event planners and experience seekers to exhibit and explore their art in an innovative way with a large auditorium to host events. It consists of 5 gallery buildings with the amount of 78 canvas spaces including a basement with a courtyard, large landscaped areas and an auditorium space fit to host events. This is a all in one immersive experience suitable for Spatial.io.
